Hello,
1 - Do the earbuds allow real-time translation without an Internet connection?
If so, how does the quality and speed of offline translation compare to online translation?
2 - Is there a data protection policy specifying where and how user information is processed?
3 - Can you confirm that there will never be a subscription required for access to the AI translation features?
Thank you.
Hi Eric,
Great questions! Here‚Äôs what you need to know:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Offline Translation ‚Äì P-G2 currently requires an internet connection for real-time translation to ensure accuracy and access to the latest AI models. We‚Äôre exploring offline options, but online translation delivers the best speed and quality.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Data Security & Privacy ‚Äì We take security seriously. P-G2 uses end-to-end AES + TLS encryption to protect your data. Users have full control over whether data is uploaded, and both local and cloud storage are fully encrypted. Our cloud security is powered by Microsoft Azure, ensuring enterprise-level protection.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Lifetime AI Membership ‚Äì All Kickstarter backers receive lifetime access to AI features, including real-time translation, AI conversations, productivity tools, and DeepSeek R1 & GPT-4o enhancements. Please check the ‚ÄúLifetime Free AI‚Äù section on our campaign page for full details.
Let us know if you have any other questions! üòä

Expectations for this product are very high, and the "Lifetime AI Membership for All Backers" campaign is also fantastic.
The only concern is the use of DeepSeek-R1. Is it possible to disable DeepSeek and configure it to use only GPT-4o?
Hi Shintaro,
Thanks for your support!
Right now, DeepSeek R1 is mainly used for advanced reasoning tasks like meeting transcription and structured analysis. For everyday AI chat, we‚Äôre optimizing the system to:
‚úÖ Use faster models (like DeepSeek V3) for casual conversations
‚úÖ Make DeepSeek R1 optional for those who need deeper analysis
‚úÖ Leverage GPT-4o for more natural and high-level conversational AI
Users will be able to manually choose between these models based on their needs, ensuring both speed and depth where required.
Let us know if you have any other questions! üòä

How do these differ from other translation earbuds that cost half the price?
Will they work in areas of high background noise?
The subscription price is very high if these are only to be used once or twice a year. How about an on-demand tariff or limited free features?
Hi Ruth,
Thanks for reaching out!
Here‚Äôs what makes P-G2 stand out and how it works:
1Ô∏è‚É£ How is P-G2 different from cheaper translation earbuds?

P-G2 is more than just a translator‚Äîit‚Äôs an AI-powered communication assistant. Unlike budget models with basic word-for-word translation, P-G2 runs on DeepSeek R1 & GPT-4o, delivering smarter, context-aware translations that feel natural and accurate.
Beyond translation, DeepSeek R1 thinks deeper‚Äîanalyzing conversations, structuring ideas, and generating mind maps for smarter communication and effortless productivity.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Will it work in noisy environments?

Yes! P-G2 features AI-powered Noise Cancellation for clear voice pickup, even in crowded caf√©s, airports, or offices. Unlike ANC (Active Noise Cancellation), which blocks noise for music, ENC enhances voice clarity while filtering out background noise, ensuring accurate translations and crystal-clear calls.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Is there an on-demand option for occasional use?
All backers get one year free, including:
‚úî Unlimited real-time & face-to-face translation
‚úî 300 minutes of voice/video call translation
‚úî 50 AI chats/day (including DeepSeek R1 advanced reasoning)
‚úî 20 AI-generated images/day

After the first year, translation and AI features require a subscription, but recording transcription time can be purchased separately as you need. We‚Äôre also exploring more flexible pricing options based on user needs.
Hope this helps! Let us know if you have any other questions. üòä
Thank you for the update.
Hi T S,
Thanks for your interest in P-G2! Happy to clarify.

P-G2 isn‚Äôt just regular earbuds‚Äîit‚Äôs an AI-powered translation and communication tool. While the app plays a role, the earbuds have built-in AI processing for real-time translation, noise cancellation, and smart voice interactions. Regular earbuds wouldn‚Äôt offer the same seamless, hands-free experience.

Offline translation isn‚Äôt included in the base subscription, as cloud-based AI ensures the most accurate and up-to-date results. We‚Äôre working on expanding offline capabilities and will share updates soon.

For real-time translation, an internet connection (WiFi or data) is needed to access AI models. Your phone acts as the processing hub, so it should be nearby. Other features like AI note-taking, voice assistance, and noise cancellation work just fine without a connection.
Hope this helps! Let us know if you have more questions. üòä
Hi T S,
Great question!
While both P-G2 and Wooask TransBuds offer AI-powered translation, P-G2 stands out with its advanced AI capabilities, deeper integration, and more versatile functionality. Here‚Äôs how they compare:
üîπ AI Power & Models ‚Äì P-G2 is powered by DeepSeek R1 and GPT-4o, delivering smarter reasoning, contextual translation, and enhanced AI interactions beyond simple text-based translation.

üîπ More Than Just Translation ‚Äì P-G2 doesn‚Äôt stop at language translation; it includes AI note-taking, real-time meeting transcription, AI-generated summaries, and even image generation, making it a true AI productivity tool rather than just a translator.

üîπ 4 Flexible Translation Modes ‚Äì P-G2 offers Simultaneous Mode, Dual-Ear Mode, Speaker Mode, and Call Translation, ensuring smooth communication across different scenarios like business meetings, travel, and international calls.

üîπ Superior Audio & Comfort ‚Äì With Hi-Res certified sound, AI-powered noise cancellation, and an independent anti-leakage system, P-G2 delivers premium sound quality while keeping conversations private and secure.
üîπ Extended Battery Life ‚Äì P-G2 offers up to 48 hours of total battery life, ensuring long-lasting performance for extended travel and work sessions.
In short, while Wooask TransBuds focus on translation, P-G2 is a next-level AI companion designed for seamless communication, productivity, and creativity‚Äîredefining what AI earbuds can do. üöÄ
Hope this helps! Let us know if you have any other questions. üòä
